title: Remake doesn't count for queues?!?!
body: I was playing with a friend and was working off my queues for AFK Behaviour and when we had an AFK and had to remake The queue didn't count... so now have to wait another 20 Minutes to play again and i still have another Queue after this.. Please Help Riot

replies.body:
They do not. A match only counts towards resolving your low-priority queue if it is a complete match, which a remade match is not. Check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for more details on the system. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
